name: Spotlight (bl4ck)
description:
Your main goal is to stay in the spotlight and don't go outside of it!

You need to dodge all the enemies that come at you or kill them while staying on the spotlight and maintaining your score!

This game was made in a couple of hours on a private game jam with XarisDev, the theme was Don't go outside and I decided to make this :) this is not a perfect game by any means and I might add some bug fixes or updates in the future!

Join my Discord if there are any problems and contact me :)

Game Development, Design - bl4ckdev
Trailer Music - Jeremy Blake
